product_name: CMC Press The Best Estes Park Hikes
long_description: Designed for the walker, hiker, snowshoer or scrambler,. Authors: Shining Mountains Group (Colorado Mountain Club) with Ward Luthi. Softcover; 108 pages; color photographs and maps. Colorado Mountain Club Press; copyright 2013. From family- and wheelchair-friendly hikes to more challenging treks, there's a hike for every ability. Part of the Colorado Mountain Club Pack Guide series,.
short_description: Designed for the walker, hiker, snowshoer or scrambler, The Best Estes Park Hikes offers up 20 hikes for any ability and includes complete trail descriptions, color photos and maps.
